name: Kitty Items
description: A CryptoKitties Sample App. Learn how to create an NFT marketplace on Flow.

CHAIN_ENV.description: Which Flow network to contect to.

MINTER_ADDRESS.description: The address where the Kitty Items contract for your app is deployed.

MINTER_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The the private key for the account where the Kitty Items contract for your app is deployed.

MINTER_ACCOUNT_KEY_INDEX.description: Which keypair from the minter account to use for transaction signing & verifying.

BLOCK_WINDOW.description: Look for events n blocks at a time.

FLOW_ACCESS_API_URL.description: URL for accessing the Flow tesntet gRPC API.

FUNGIBLE_TOKEN_ADDRESS.description: Address for the standard Fungible Token contract on testnet.

NON_FUNGIBLE_TOKEN_ADDRESS.description: Address for the standard Non-Fungible Token (NFT) contract on testnet.

METADATA_VIEWS_ADDRESS.description: The address for the standard metadata contract on testnet.

FLOW_TOKEN_ADDRESS.description: Address for the standard FlowToken contract on testnet.

NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_FLOW_TOKEN.description: The address where the FlowToken contract is deployed on testnet for this app.

NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_KITTY_ITEMS.description: The address where the KittyItems contract is deployed on testnet for this app.

NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NFT_STOREFRONT.description: The address where the KittyItemsMarket contract is deployed on testnet for this app.

NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_NON_FUNGIBLE_TOKEN.description: The address for the standard Non-Fungible Token (NFT) contract on testnet.

NEXT_PUBLIC_CONTRACT_METADATA_VIEWS.description: The address for the standard metadata contract on testnet.

NEXT_PUBLIC_FLOW_ADDRESS.description: The address of the admin account. (Same address where Storefront contract is deployed).

NEXT_PUBLIC_FLOW_ACCESS_API_URL.description: URL for accessing the Flow tesntet gRPC API. (Used by @onflow/fcl)

NEXT_PUBLIC_API_KITTY_ITEM_MINT.description: RESTful endpoint for minting Kitty Items (Non-Fungible Token).

NEXT_PUBLIC_API_MARKET_ITEMS_LIST.description: RESTful endpoint for reading the latest marketplace listings.

NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL.description: The location of the API endpoint for this instance of Kitty Items. (The Heroku URL of your app).

NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL.description: The location of this instance of Kitty Items. (The Heroku URL of your app).

NEXT_PUBLIC_AVATAR_URL.description: Service that generates Flow avatars for profiles.

NEXT_PUBLIC_WALLET_DISCOVERY.description: URL for fcl wallet discovery service for testnet wallets.
